paragraphs.title: Collaborative Filtering:  Alternating Least Squares Matrix Factorization
Use The Historical Data For Model Training (80%) And Testing (20%)
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.ALS
import org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.Rating

val ratings = likesDF.map(like => 
  Rating(like(0).asInstanceOf[Int], like(1).asInstanceOf[Int], 1)
)

val splitRatings = ratings.randomSplit(Array(1.0,0.0))	
val (trainingRatings, testingRatings) = (splitRatings(0), splitRatings(1))
trainingRatings.cache()
testingRatings.cache()

result.msg:

import org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.Rating
ratings: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.Rating] = MapPartitionsRDD[760] at map at <console>:68
splitRatings: Array[org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.Rating]] = Array(MapPartitionsRDD[761] at randomSplit at <console>:70, MapPartitionsRDD[762] at randomSplit at <console>:70)
trainingRatings: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.Rating] = MapPartitionsRDD[761] at randomSplit at <console>:70
testingRatings: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.Rating] = MapPartitionsRDD[762] at randomSplit at <console>:70
res208: trainingRatings.type = MapPartitionsRDD[761] at randomSplit at <console>:70
res209: testingRatings.type = MapPartitionsRDD[762] at randomSplit at <console>:70

paragraphs.title: Train The Model Using The Historical Training Split Of The Historical Data
paragraphs.text:
val rank = 10
val numIterations = 20
val convergenceThreshold = 0.01

val model = ALS.train(trainingRatings, rank, numIterations, convergenceThreshold)

convergenceThreshold: Double = 0.01
